titleStmt.title: Version Log for Version Log for Lectio 46
titleStmt.author: Jeffrey C. Witt

availability.p: Published under a Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 License

div.head: Description of changes for 2012.08
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It ahas been copied from a working draft of the St. Victor transcription and it awaits corrections and additions that result from a comparision of the manuscript witnesses. A critical apparatus and footnotes with citations and cross reference need to be added. Image coordinates for each paragraph still need to be embedded with relevant source file
